A custom Editor for RigidbodyPathMove components.
Author: Mathew Aloisio

A custom Editor for TransformPathMove components.
Author: Mathew Aloisio

A public static class that stores settings for the 'Path Move Editor'.
Author: Mathew Aloisio

member.name: T:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorSettings.SettingsData
member.summary: Defines the settings for the PathMoveEditorSettings static class.

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorSettings.SettingsData.autoRenameWaypoints
member.summary: Should waypoints be automatically renamed after adding or removing waypoints using the editor?

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorSettings.SettingsData.autoGenWaypointMaterial
member.summary: The material to use for automatically generated waypoints..

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorSettings.EDITOR_PREFS_STRING_GLOBAL
member.summary: The string name the 'Global' path move editor settings are saved under in 'EditorPrefs'.

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorSettings.DEFAULT_MATERIAL_PATH
member.summary: The default waypoint material path for generated waypoints.

member.name: P:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorSettings.Global
member.summary: The global path move editor settings.

member.name: M:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorSettings.SaveEditorPrefs
member.summary: Saves the editor preferences for the 'Path Move Editor Settings'.

member.name: M:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorSettings.LoadEditorPrefs
member.summary: Loads the editor preferences for the 'Path Move Editor Settings'.

members.member:
A window where path move gizmo settings can be modified.
Author: Mathew Aloisio

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorSettingsWindow.autoRenameWaypoints
member.summary: Should waypoints be automatically renamed after adding or removing waypoints using the editor?

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorSettingsWindow.autoGenWaypointMaterial
member.summary: The Material to use for auto-generated waypoints.

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorSettingsWindow.m_WaypointEditorSettingsGroupEnabled
member.summary: Is the waypoint editor settings dropdown enabled?

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorSettingsWindow.waypointSphereRadius
member.summary: The radius used to render PathMove Waypoint sphere gizmos.

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorSettingsWindow.waypointSphereColor
member.summary: The color used to render PathMove Waypoint sphere gizmos.

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorSettingsWindow.highlightedWaypointSphereColor
member.summary: The color used to render highlighted PathMove Waypoint sphere gizmos.

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorSettingsWindow.waypointLabelFontSize
member.summary: The font size used to render PathMove Waypoint label gizmos.

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorSettingsWindow.waypointLabelFontColor
member.summary: The font color used to render PathMove Waypoint label gizmos.

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorSettingsWindow.highlightedWaypointLabelFontColor
member.summary: The font color used to render highlighted PathMove Waypoint label gizmos.

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorSettingsWindow.m_WaypointGizmoSettingsGroupEnabled
member.summary: Is the waypoint gizmo settings dropdown enabled?

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorSettingsWindow.pathDotsPerUnit
member.summary: The number of path visualization dots per distance unit.

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorSettingsWindow.pathDotSphereGizmoRadius
member.summary: The radius of the path visualization dot sphere gizmos.

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorSettingsWindow.pathDotSphereStartColor
member.summary: The color of the path visualization dot sphere gizmos at the start of a path.

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorSettingsWindow.pathDotSphereEndColor
member.summary: The color of the path visualization dot sphere gizmos at the end of a path.

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorSettingsWindow.closedPathDotSphereGizmoColor
member.summary: The color of the path visualization dot sphere gizmos that mark a closed pathing loop.

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorSettingsWindow.m_PathVisualizationSettingsGroupEnabled
member.summary: Is the path visualization settings dropdown enabled?

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorSettingsWindow.MINIMUM_FONT_SIZE
member.summary: The minimum font size for gizmo labels.

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorSettingsWindow.MAXIMUM_FONT_SIZE
member.summary: The maximum font size for gizmo labels.

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorSettingsWindow.MINIMUM_DOTS_PER_UNIT
member.summary: The minimum number of path visualization dots per unit.

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorSettingsWindow.MAXIMUM_DOTS_PER_UNIT
member.summary: The maximum number of path visualization dots per unit.

member.name: E:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorSettingsWindow.Initialized
member.summary: A C# delegate event that is invoked when the PathMoveEditorSettingsWindow is intialized.

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorSettingsWindow.m_ScrollPosition
member.summary: The scroll position for the editor window.

member.name: M:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorSettingsWindow.OverwriteGlobalSettings
member.summary: Overwrites the PathMoveGizmo and PathMoveEditorSettings static classes' settings with the ones from this PathMoveEditorSettingsWindow.

member.name: M:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorSettingsWindow.OverwriteLocalSettings
member.summary: Overwrites the editor window's settings with the relevant static classes' settings.

member.name: M:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorSettingsWindow.ResetGlobalSettings
member.summary: Resets and overwrites the PathMoveGizmo and PathMoveEditorSettings static classes' settings with the ones from this PathMoveEditorSettingsWindow.

members.member:
A tool designed to make it even easier to edit waypoints.
Author: Mathew Aloisio

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorWindow.WaypointType.AutoGenerate
member.summary: Automatically generate visual waypoint.

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorWindow.WaypointType.Prefab
member.summary: Use prefab to place visual waypoint.

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorWindow.WaypointType.Empty
member.summary: A waypoint with no visual.

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorWindow.WaypointSpawnPoint.PreviousWaypoint
member.summary: Spawn the waypoint positioned and rotated to match the previous waypoint if possible, otherwise falls back to mover.

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorWindow.WaypointSpawnPoint.Mover
member.summary: Spawn the waypoint positioned and rotated to match the mover.

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorWindow.waypointName
member.summary: The name to give to waypoints created using the editor.

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorWindow.waypointContainer
member.summary: A reference to a Transform to store created waypoints in.

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorWindow.waypointSpawn
member.summary: Controls how waypoints are spawned. Mover - Spawn the waypoint positioned and rotated to match the mover. PreviousWaypoint - Spawn the waypoint positioned and rotated to match the previous waypoint if possible, otherwise falls back to mover.

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorWindow.waypointType
member.summary: The type of waypoint to create. AutoGenerate - Automatically generate visual waypoint. Prefab - Use prefab to place visual waypoint. Empty - A waypoint with no visual.

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorWindow.waypointPrefab
member.summary: A reference to the prefab that is used when making 'Prefab' waypoints.

member.name: P:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorWindow.EditingPathMove
member.summary: A reference to the PathMove currently being edited, or null.

member.name: P:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorWindow.EditingWaypointIndex
member.summary: Returns the index of the waypoint currently being edited in the EditingPathMove.waypoints array, or -1.

member.name: P:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorWindow.EditingWaypoint
member.summary: Returns the Transform for the waypoint currently being edited, or null.

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorWindow.DEFAULT_WAYPOINT_NAME
member.summary: The default name for waypoints.

member.name: E:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorWindow.Initialized
member.summary: An event that is invoked when the PathMoveEditorWindow is intialized.

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorWindow.m_PathMoveSettingsGroupEnabled
member.summary: Is the PathMove settings dropdown enabled?

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorWindow.m_WaypointEditorGroupEnabled
member.summary: Is the waypoint settings dropdown enabled?

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorWindow.m_ScrollPosition
member.summary: The scroll position for the editor window.

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorWindow.m_EditingPathMove
member.summary: The hidden backing field for the 'EditingPathMove' property.

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorWindow.m_EditingWaypointIndex
member.summary: The hidden backing field for the 'EditingWaypointIndex' property.

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorWindow.m_SelectedWaypointReachedEventComponent
member.summary: A reference to the component the 'SelectedWaypointReachedEventEditor' was created for.

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorWindow.m_SelectedWaypointReachedEventEditor
member.summary: The 'waypoint reached event' editor being displayed for the selected waypoint.

member.name: M:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorWindow.AddWaypoint(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds a waypoint at the end of 'EditingPathMove.waypoints' array.
member.param: Make the newly added waypoint the active selection?

member.name: M:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorWindow.AddWaypointAtIndex(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds a waypoint at the given index in the 'EditingPathMove.waypoints' array, shifting array elements and expanding the array as neccesary. NOTE: pIndex can not be greater than EditingPathMove.WaypointCount. NOTE: When pIndex == EditingPathMove.WaypointCount this adds a waypoint at the end of the array and shifts no elements.
member.param: Make the newly added waypoint the active selection?

member.name: M:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorWindow.RemoveWaypointByIndex(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Removes the waypoint at the given index in the 'EditingPathMove.waypoints' array, shifting elements above it down in the array.
member.param: Automatically make the previous waypoint (if valid) or next waypoint (if valid) the active selection?

member.name: M:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorWindow.SelectPreviousWaypoint
member.summary: Selects the previous waypoint in 'EditingPathMove.waypoints' before EditingWaypointIndex. NOTE: Does nothing if 'EditingPathMove' is null, or if the waypoints array is null or empty. NOTE: This method automatically wraps the selection.

member.name: M:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorWindow.SelectNextWaypoint
member.summary: Selects the next waypoint in 'EditingPathMove.waypoints' after EditingWaypointIndex. NOTE: Does nothing if 'EditingPathMove' is null, or if the waypoints array is null or empty. NOTE: This method automatically wraps the selection.

member.name: M:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorWindow.ValidateContainerComponents
member.summary: Ensures the 'waypointContainer' contains the components specifeid in the editor. If they are missing they are added. Registers undo group upon adding component.

member.name: M:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorWindow.ValidateWaypointComponents
member.summary: Ensures all waypoints of 'EditingPathMove' contain the components specified in the editor. If they are missing they are added. Registers undo group upon adding component.

member.name: M:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorWindow.RenameWaypoints
member.summary: Renames all waypoints in 'EditingPathMove' by number while also registering an undo group.

member.name: M:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorWindow.InstantiateWaypoint(System.Int32)
member.summary: Instantiates a waypoint based on the current settings and returns the Transform, or null if failed.
member.param: The index the instantiated waypoint will be in.
member.returns: The Tranasform of the instantiated waypoint, or null.

member.name: M:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveEditorWindow.DrawSelectedWaypointReachedEventEditor(Waypoints.Pathing.InvokeEventOnWaypointReachedByPathMove)
member.summary: When invoked in OnGUI draws the 'Editor' for the InvokeEventOnWaypointReachedByPathMove component specified.

members.member:
Draws editor gizmos for PathMoves.
Author: Mathew Aloisio

member.name: T:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveGizmo.SettingsData
member.summary: Defines the settings for the PathMoveEditorSettings static class.

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveGizmo.SettingsData.waypointSphereRadius
member.summary: The radius used to render PathMove Waypoint sphere gizmos.

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveGizmo.SettingsData.waypointSphereColor
member.summary: The color used to render PathMove Waypoint sphere gizmos.

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveGizmo.SettingsData.highlightedWaypointSphereColor
member.summary: The color used to render highlighted PathMove Waypoint sphere gizmos.

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveGizmo.SettingsData.waypointLabelFontSize
member.summary: The font size used to render PathMove Waypoint label gizmos.

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveGizmo.SettingsData.waypointLabelFontColor
member.summary: The font color used to render PathMove Waypoint label gizmos.

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveGizmo.SettingsData.highlightedWaypointLabelFontColor
member.summary: The font color used to render highlighted PathMove Waypoint label gizmos.

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveGizmo.SettingsData.pathDotsPerUnit
member.summary: How many dots should their be per distance unit? A value of 0 means no path visualization.

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveGizmo.SettingsData.pathDotSphereGizmoRadius
member.summary: The radius of path visualization sphere gizmo dots.

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveGizmo.SettingsData.pathDotSphereStartColor
member.summary: The color of path visualization sphere gizmo dots at the start of a path.

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveGizmo.SettingsData.pathDotSphereEndColor
member.summary: The color of path visualization sphere gizmo dots at the end of a path.

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveGizmo.SettingsData.closedPathDotSphereGizmoColor
member.summary: The color of closed loop path visualization sphere gizmo dots.

member.name: P:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveGizmo.ForceDrawPathMoveGizmos
member.summary: A reference to a PathMove to forcefully draw gizmos for.

member.name: P:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveGizmo.HighlightWaypoint
member.summary: A reference to the Transform of the waypoint that should be highlighted, or null.

member.name: F:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveGizmo.EDITOR_PREFS_STRING_SETTINGS
member.summary: The string name the 'Settings' path move gizmo settings are saved under in 'EditorPrefs'.

member.name: P:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveGizmo.Settings
member.summary: The settings for path move gizmos.

member.name: M:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveGizmo.DrawPathVisualization(Waypoints.Pathing.PathMove,System.Int32,System.Int32,UnityEngine.Color,UnityEngine.Color)
member.summary: Renders a path visualization between pA and pB based on the current settings using pPathMove's Interpolator. NOTE: pWaypointIndexA and pWaypointIndexB must have a difference of exactly 1 index. NOTE: The Interpolator evaluates movement from pWaypointIndexA to pWaypointIndexB.
member.param: The color to render the path dots at the start of a path with.
The color to render the path dots at the end of a path with.

member.name: M:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveGizmo.DrawLabel(UnityEngine.Vector3,System.String,System.Single,System.Int32,UnityEngine.Color)
member.summary: Draws a Handles label with the specified settings.

member.name: M:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveGizmo.SaveEditorPrefs
member.summary: Saves the editor preferences for the 'Path Move Gizmo Settings'.

member.name: M:Waypoints.Editor.Pathing.PathMoveGizmo.LoadEditorPrefs
member.summary: Loads the editor preferences for the 'Path Move Gizmo Settings'.

members.member:
A public static class that provides some useful helper function(s) related to things like copying and instantiating visual-only representations of GameObjects.
Author: Mathew Aloisio

member.name: F:Waypoints.WaypointsEditorUtility.COMPONENTS_WHITELIST
member.summary: An array of components that are allowed on 'visual' representations of objects.

member.name: M:Waypoints.WaypointsEditorUtility.InstantiateVisualInstance(UnityEngine.GameObject,UnityEngine.Transform,UnityEngine.Material)
member.summary: Instantiates a visual instance of the GameObject, pObject, and returns it.
member.param: The copy object to make a visual instance of.
The parent Transform for the newly instantiated GameObject.
An optional material override parameter. If non-null all materials will be overridden with the referenced Material.
member.returns: a GameObject that is a visual-only copy of pObject.

member.name: M:Waypoints.WaypointsEditorUtility.SafeDestroy(UnityEngine.Object,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Safely destroys a UnityEngine.Object based on whether or not the application is running. Registers an undo record for the destroy if the application is not running. Destroys dependant components of MonoBehaviours automatically.
member.param: Should an undo entry be added when destroying in editor mode?

member.name: M:Waypoints.WaypointsEditorUtility.DestroyRequiredComponents(UnityEngine.MonoBehaviour,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Destroys
member.param: Should an undo entry be added when destroying in editor mode?

member.name: M:Waypoints.WaypointsEditorUtility.Private_SafeDestroy(UnityEngine.Object,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Safely destroys a UnityEngine.Object based on whether or not the application is running. Registers an undo record for the destroy if the application is not running.
member.param: When in editor mode should an undo entry be added?

member.name: M:Waypoints.WaypointsEditorUtility.RemoveWaypointByIndex(Waypoints.Pathing.PathMove,System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes the waypoint at the given index in the 'pPathMove.waypoints' array, shifting elements above it down in the array, and destroying the waypoint GameObject if it is valid. No undo record is made.
